To start and stop recording you can tap on the red text overlay on the preview window, or use the Menu key to access Record/Stop buttons.

To upload recorded videos to videobin.org, YouTube, Facebook or to a custom FTP server use the Gallery menu, accessed via the Menu key. You can also watch the video with the inbuilt video player, edit the title and description, email the video as an attachment to somebody, email or tweet the hosted URL of an uploaded video, view the hosted URL in a browser, or delete the video. 

To set recording duration and file size limits, email address, FTP details as well as set automatic uploads use the Preferences menu, accessed via the Menu key.

Get more support at http://vidiom.net.au/
The camera failed to start recording. Sorry.
The SD card access failed, so we can not record videos. Sorry.
You have not recorded any video yet.
You are still recording video. Please stop recording first, then send.
We can not connect to the video hosting service. Check your preferences please.
We can not login to your account on the video hosting service. Sorry. Check your FTP host username and password preferences please.
Recording finished. Video file is in gallery as
You can upload this video via the gallery.
Login to Facebook to upload videos.
Either the maximum filesize for video, or maximum recording duration, was reached. You can set these in Preferences.

Welcome to Vidiom!\nUse the Menu key to start and stop video recording, set your Preferences and go to the Gallery.\nPlease set your email address in the Preferences menu to receive email notifications of your uploaded videos.

Please note, the video camera captures MP4 (H263/AMR-NB) video in Landscape orientation. To upload to Youtube, you must associate your google account with Youtube at http://youtube.com/.\nGet support at http://vidiom.mobi/
Please set up a google.com email account with which to log into YouTube.
Do you really want to delete the video? This deletes the file from the disk as well as removing from the database!
